# Abstract Submission

Information on abstract submission, including important dates, formatting guidelines, and submission platform, will be provided here.

## Important dates

- **Opening of abstract submission:** To be announced  
- **Deadline for abstract submission:** To be announced  
- **Notification of acceptance:** To be announced  

## Guidelines

- Abstracts should be written in English.  
- The abstract body should not exceed the word limit specified in the final call.  
- Please indicate your preferred presentation format (oral or poster) when submitting.  

Further details and a template will be provided once the submission system is open.
